title: CircuitBreaker： fix race condition， adjust reset policy
body:
1. fix sp->circuit_breaker->Reset() 时可能存在的data race
2. 调整CircuitBreaker::Reset的策略，Reset之后，如果已经经过了初始化阶段，则继续使用之前ema_latency。如果Reset的时候还处于初始化阶段，则丢弃之前积累的数据

repo.description: brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".

title: Health check by rpc call
body:
By default health check succeeds if server can be connected. If this feature is used, health check is completed not only when server can be connected but also an additional http call succeeds indicated by FLAGS_health_check_path and FLAGS_health_check_timeout_ms

这个功能的改法是这样的，在健康检查时，默认如果connect成功server就恢复，而在health_check_path被设置时，socket在Revive()后会进入一个“用rpc进行hc”的状态，同时原来的HealthCheckTask结束，此时用户还是不能从lb中或者singleserver中选择这台机器。在这个状态时，如果rpc成功了，则恢复socket到正常状态；如果rpc失败了，只要socket不断，就会不停地间隔地发送rpc；如果rpc失败了且socket是Failed状态，则结束这个状态，之前的那一个SetFailed会触发下一次hc。

还需要区别是用户call还是hc call，前者无法选到socket，而后者可以正常选，从而发送rpc，这是通过在controller中加一个flag来实现

title: fix h2 big response not sending bug
body:
* 当h2response的包体长度小于remote window size时，当前的做法是直接return，导致client无法收到response。
spec中并未说明此情况的做法，一个办法是直接返回RST_STREAM，即此次pr的解决方案。另一种方案是等到收到WINDOW_UPDATE后重试，需要额外的设计和实现。
* 修复sending时的memory leak

title: tls: MesaLink TLS backend for RPC over TLS
body:
[MesaLink](https://github.com/mesalock-linux/mesalink) is a memory-safe and OpenSSL-compatible TLS library written in [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/), a programming language that guarantees memory safety. This PR adds MesaLink as a TLS backend for brpc. It can be enabled by passing "--with-mesalink" to config_brpc.sh. 

MesaLink is an open-source project incubated by Baidu Security Lab. It is part of [Open AI System Security Alliance](https://oases.io/mesalink) and [Baidu AIoT Security Solutions](https://aiotsec.baidu.com/). MesaLink has >10 million monthly active users as of 12/2018.

MesaLink is also a TLS backend of curl since 7.62.0 ([pull request](https://github.com/curl/curl/pull/2984)), and one of the seven backends supporting TLS 1.3.

reference from https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/command/configure_file.html
> Input file lines of the form “#cmakedefine VAR …” will be replaced with either “#define VAR …” or /* #undef VAR */ depending on whether VAR is set in CMake to any value not considered a false constant by the if() command.

body:
Add always_print_primitive_fields flags into Controller and json2pb::Pb2JsonOptions.

When serialize protobuf3 into json default fields do not dumps; this can be done by setting always_print_primitive_fields to true.

title: CircuitBreaker_Bug_Fix
body: 在pooled模式下，[sending_sock可能会先被回收](https://github.com/brpc/brpc/blob/4fec80cb2434712017a7f512a430e8a17b42a157/src/brpc/controller.cpp#L724)，之后再调用GetOrNewSharedPart时，就会直接New一个SharedPart。导致数据无法被正确反馈到CircuitBreaker。

title: customise span exporter
body:
1、 将span db 的逻辑从span.cpp中剥离出来放到rpcz.cpp
2、 增加开关enable_trace，用来控制是否产生span，为了和之前逻辑兼容，打开rpcz的时候也会生成span。
3、 增加RegisterSpanExporter/UnregisterSpanExporter接口，注册新的span导出方法。
4、 修复了在服务端发起不join的异步请求时的FATAL问题

title: Exposing the status of CircuitBreaker to the builtIn page
body:
在SharedPart统计了每个Socket的出错情况，并暴露在connections页面上。
error_count : 总的出错次数
health_index : 100表示没出错，接近0表示即将被熔断)
broken_times : 被SetFailed的次数, 仅记录SetFailed=0的次数
不论是否开启熔断都会进行统计。

title: Fix compile error in thrift_protocol.cpp under macOS
body:
Compile error:

/tmp/brpc-20180926-16463-1e3avfz/brpc-a9e954879fda1c63f0f772b47d87943129e5af1f/src/brpc/policy/thrift_protocol.cpp:52:38: error: expected function body after function declarator
void bthread_assign_data(void* data) __THROW;

__THROW is only defined in glibc, which cannot be used in non-glibc systems.
As none of the other protocol uses __THROW for the same function, I assume it is safe to remove
(or replace it with 'noexcept' specifier in standard C++11).

title: codel concurrency limiter
body:
根据codel队列管理算法演变而来的限流算法，以排队时间(start_parsed_us - received_us)作为判断服务是否过载的依据，并且允许短时间的超载。
1. 优点是在服务未满载、qps/latency发生波动时，预期之外的ELIMIT错误非常少。
2. 缺陷是当性能瓶颈是下游服务时，并不能对下游服务起到保护作用

title: change the backlog of listen() from INT_MAX to 65535
body:
1. linux系统的 /proc/sys/net/core/somaxconn 默认值是 262144。2. listen函数的形参backlog是int类型，但内核中接收参数的类型却是一个unsignd short 类型，当backlog大于65535即发生整数溢出，而262144溢出后的数值恰好是零 。
这两点容易造成，Linux下brpc默认的backlog被设置成了零，而这一般是不符合用户期望的。

repo.name: brpc
repo.description: brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".

title: Brpc couchbase
body:
方案简述：
1. CouchbaseChannel用来发送couchbase 请求，和普通的channel一样。
2. CouchbaseNamingService 监听vbucket mapping的变化，并最新vbucket mapping 。
3. CouchbaseLoadBalancer 选择vbucket映射的server，发送请求。
4. CouchbaseRetryPolicy处理一些错误场景下的重试，主要是rebalance/failover的场景。
5. Couchbase 对于couchbase request/response的组包和解包。接口和memcache基本一致。不支持pipeline

title: Make escaping and quoting in redis more reasonable
body:
1. Flush previous component when beginning and ending quotes
2. Escape quote symbols in quoted contents
3. Quote backslash and doublequote when printing redis messages
4. Print better logs for unmatched quotes
